title: (36650) Caldas de Reis - 26 Rúa Xoan Fuentes Echevarría
title_short: (36650) Caldas de Reis - 26 Rúa Xoan Fuentes Echevarría

title: (36653) Caldas de Reis - 26 Lugar Segad de Arriba
title_short: (36653) Caldas de Reis - 26 Lugar Segad de Arriba
description: Quiet and flat parking in the middle of nature, asphalted and with shade, right in front of the door of the Hydroelectric building. No house in sight. We have spent the night in silence and alone. In the morning at 9 am there may be walkers. Perfect for walking and going to the Cangas Waterfalls and its natural pools, with vineyard paths between houses. Access is good by road, but not for a very large motorhome, because there are a couple of hairpin bends. A 5 star place.

title: (36658) Caldas de Reis - 34 Rúa Estacion
description: A new area with all the services and in a pleasant space. Recommended to go with children because of the space it has. It has paddle tennis courts.

title: (36653) Caldas de Reyes - PO-221
description: Parking in nature next to a reservoir. there is a climbing area five minutes away and a route to the mills. there is a viewpoint to a waterfall nearby. the descent is dirt and there are some potholes, you have to be careful. views of the lake from the reservoir. passes a nearby road but sleeps well

title: (36658) Paradela - 2 Rua Paradela

title: (36653) Caldas de Reyes - 4 PO-221

We have not slept but it seems to be a good place for it.

title: (36658) - 16 Lugar a Igrexa
description: Opposite the church between Santiago de Compostela and Pondavera, perfect for a stopover before arriving in Portugal, very very quiet, beautiful unobstructed view between the vines, barely 1 minute from the N-550 large flat car park

title: (36659) Caldas de Reyes - 94 N-550

They treated us very kindly, I suppose something will have to do with the owner having a CAMPER.

title: (36675) - 28 Rua San Ildefonso

title_short: (36629) A Pantrigueira - 61 Lugar Pantrigueira de Arriba

The washing pressure is excellent, waxed and very good (about 3 minutes for each euro). They are super nice and let fill with water if you wash the van. They do not have a specific emptying area for motorhomes (gray and black water), but they have a bathroom. Great place recommended before entering the island of Arousa or preparing the trip by leaving it.

name: Camping El Terrón
title: (36629) Camping El Terrón
description: Camping El Terrón, the last of three campsites side by side. An old part with fixed caravans and a recent one for the classic campers. There the trees are still young and therefore offer little shade. Good sanitary but small. Water and electricity accessible to all places direct access to the beach, bar, restaurant in season. But barking dogs all night.

title: (36620) Vilanova de Arousa - 39 Calle Terrón
description: Fantastic spot right on edge of the beach which is dog-friendly.  There are some shady spots under trees. Very level.  We spent a fabulous night here, two or three other vans nearby.  There is a chiringuito right by beach but is quiet at night.  To access, take the dirt track directly next to the garden centre which goes down behind the Hotel Dinajan.  Go to the left of the car park which says no campervans and the track takes you under the bridge and directly to the beach.

title: (36630) Cambados - 1 Rúa Carreira

title: (36630) Cambados - 56-58 Rúa Pombal

This place is made of asphalt and compacted earth, level and with shade; since it has a grove that protects it. It is very quiet and is next to the sports center. A small bike path starts here and it is very close to Tragove tide mill

title: (15883) Teo -
description: AC do Xirimbao area. Overnight area of the City Council of Teo. It has 4 specific spaces for motorhomes in the middle of a large car park that allows the installation of more campers. Inoperative night lighting, picnic tables under the oak trees, 1 operational public toilet, space for emptying gray and black water and water loading. The city council is working to increase services with electrical connection points in parking spaces. It is a natural area integrated into the Natura 2000 Network. A pedestrian suspension bridge, called "Mariola", allows you to cross the River Ulla to the neighboring town hall of A Estrada. A pedestrian path, which is taken along the river, takes you to the nearby town of Pontevea, located 3 km away following that path. Bathing indicated with various signs is prohibited because it is an area of currents. The City Council of Teo appreciates that if it detects any incident in the area, notify the entity by contacting the local Development and Tourism offices (Monday to Friday from 08:00 to 15:00 or by email aedl at teo.gal) or with the police local or Civil Protection from Monday to Sunday from 08:00 to 22:00 (You can obtain the telephone numbers on the internet, since they are eliminated here).

title: (36626) Arousa - 28 Travesía Riason

Good place, at the end of crossing the Illa Arousa bridge. Many motorhomes and well organized. ,.
We must respect the parking areas, do not remove chairs or tables as we can be very annoying and it is forbidden.
The bar there is a very good tapas and wine list at a good price and they are open until October.

title: (15911) - 36 Lugar Lamego
description: Seira river beach. Picnic tables in the shade. Reduced parking space. There is a bar. In summer can be crowded. Quiet and pleasant place. It is reached by A Escravitude on the N-550 or from the Antequeira junction, in Rois.

title: (36003) Pontevedra - 17 Avenida Marín
description: Parking near the city, without services, flat, ideal for visiting the city, a little noisy due to traffic. Overnight stay prohibited, signs posted at the entrance

name: Área Fluvial A Praíña
title: (36683) Área Fluvial A Praíña
description:
Private venue managed by the ENTREAPONTES Association. Located 13 km (9 km by highway) from Santiago de Compostela, 20 minutes by bus from the Intermodal Station. River beach within the enclosure with a beach bar and large terrace, organization of concerts... Exclusive and limited area for campers, caravans and motorhomes of 16,000 m2 out of a total of 36,000 m2. Modalities of collaboration and use of the facilities:
 Contribution of elements such as awnings, chairs, tables... together with the camper for 1 day/night of camping in collaboration with a donation to the association, as a novelty the BARBECUE area for use by Camper users and partners on request.
 Garbage collectors outside. Multiple conventional bathrooms, taps to load water, empty wastewater, laundry rooms; complementary services:
Tourist Information Office, Shop/Bakery (Bread and empanadas to order the day before, sale of coal €4 per 3kg bag)...
 Adjacent to Ponte Vea (medieval bridge), declared an Asset of Cultural Interest (BIC) The large areas of sun and shade also stand out. The enclosure is fenced with access gates. There are hiking trails on both sides of the Ulla River. Supermarket, gas station, ATM, pharmacy, bars, restaurants... 300/400 meters.

                 BASIC RULES
1 - Quiet hours from 12:00 a.m. to 9:00 a.m.
2 - You cannot make fires on the ground or barbecues outside the designated area.
3 - Maintain hygiene in the enclosure: leave the waste inside its relevant containers.
4 - Respect the vegetation of the enclosure.
5 - Maintain respect for users and workers.
6 - The use of devices that can cause acoustic disturbances (speakers, instruments) is prohibited.
7 - The consumption of drugs or narcotics within the premises is prohibited.
8 - Clothes cannot be hung in unauthorized places.
9 - All the rules of the internal regulations of the A Praíña Fluvial Area must be followed.

title_short: (15883) Teo - 17 Estrada do Castro de Pontevea

name: Camping Salinas
title: (36626) Camping Salinas
description: Camping Salinas (2 stars), but with the bare essentials. Very clean bathrooms. Friendly and pleasant welcome. Direct access to the beach. The only downside I saw is the lack of closing time for the children's area, because if you have an adjacent property and want to sleep early you will have a hard time until around 12pm. Beach bar attached to the campsite and others along the beautiful 2 km long beach walk. Barbecue area with approx. 5 places.
